title: Event Endpoints Response Models
description: Comprehensive JSON schema documentation for all Event API endpoints

AbstractNetworkResponse.description: Base response class for legacy endpoints

head.description: Response metadata including status and timing

NetworkResponse.description: Base response class for new network layer

coreEventEndpoints.description: Retrieves complete event details including teams, scores, status, and metadata
Returns chronological list of match incidents like goals, cards, substitutions

incidents.description: List of match incidents in chronological order

homeShirtColors.description: Home team shirt colors for visualization

awayShirtColors.description: Away team shirt colors for visualization

coreEventEndpoints.description: Returns team lineups including starting XI, substitutes, formation, and player ratings

away.description: Away team lineup details (same structure as home)

firstTeamAverageRating.description: Average rating of first team players

secondTeamAverageRating.description: Average rating of second team players

pregameRatingShown.description: Whether pregame ratings should be displayed

shouldReverseTeams.description: Flag indicating if team display should be reversed

coreEventEndpoints.description: Returns detailed match statistics like possession, shots, passes, etc.

eventAnalyticsEndpoints.description: Returns the best performing players in the match based on ratings and statistics
Summary of best players performance with key statistics
Returns average positions of players on the field during the match
Returns momentum and event timeline graph data
Returns win probability graph throughout the match
Head-to-head statistics between the two teams

eventMediaEndpoints.description: Returns video highlights and key moments

eventShotmapsHeatmaps.description: Returns shot locations and outcomes for football matches
Returns team heatmap showing player positioning and ball touches

action.description: Type of action at this position

eventShotmapsHeatmaps.description: Returns shot locations and outcomes for hockey matches
Returns shot locations and outcomes for basketball team
Returns shot locations and outcomes for a specific football player in an event
Returns shot locations and outcomes for a specific hockey player in an event
Returns shot locations and outcomes for a specific player in an event
Returns individual player heatmap data for an event

eventCommentaryEndpoints.description: Returns innings data for cricket/baseball events
Returns point-by-point data for tennis/volleyball matches

pointType.description: 1 = standard point, 2 = return point/break conversion, 3 = decisive hold (game/set clincher), 5 = point conceded on the opponent side, 6 = tie-break mini-break.

specializedSportsEndpoints.description: Cricket-specific runs per over progression graph
Tennis match power and momentum data
Teams' recent form before the match

eventMetadataEndpoints.description: Returns manager/coach information for both teams
Returns series information for multi-game series
Returns current team streaks and records
Returns fan voting data for match outcome

eventsendpoints.description: Auto-generated endpoint definition from HAR analysis

errorHandling.description: Standard error responses across all endpoints

headers.X-RateLimit-Reset: Unix timestamp when rate limit resets
